name: Blockbuster (RichardDally)
description:
Blockbuster

This game aims to provide another experience (different actions/different items) of fast-paced bomberman old games.

Keymapping

- Q/A : LEFT

- D: RIGHT

- Z/W: UP

- S: DOWN

- F: SLIDE

- E: SLASH (cosmetic only, no impact on gameplay, wip)

- R: THROW (cosmetic only, no impact on gameplay, wip)

- SPACE: DROP A BOMB

Feedback

Constructive feedback is greatly appreciated.
